results.content: This course is not about Oracle Apex. It is more about SQL Workshop. Teacher are not showing the low code solutions that Apex is used for. He is more focused on pure SQL, even in moments that can be implemented in apex itself. The title of this course is misleading.

response.content:
Thank you so much for following the tutorials.
I really appreciate your feedback Adam Stopa.

And I’m really sorry for not meeting your expectations.

In this course I wanted to show how to create simple web app with Oracle apex and also some concepts on adding custom codes, using triggers for security and raising custom errors, using sequences, etc (as stated in course description). 
and targeted mostly to beginners an intermediate learners.

So, it’s low code which didn’t mean no code.
